original_text: By thee have I been holden up from the womb: thou art he that took me out of my mother's bowels: my praise shall be continually of thee.
korean_text: 내가 모태에서부터 주를 의지하였으며 나의 어머니의 배에서부터 주께서 나를 택하셨사오니 나는 항상 주를 찬송하리이다

sentences.original_text: By thee have I been holden up from the womb
thou art he that took me out of my mother's bowels
my praise shall be continually of thee
